text: Krzysztof Stelmach (born 11 November 1967) is a former Polish volleyball player, a member of the Poland men's national volleyball team in 1987–1997 and a head coach of Polish club Stal Nysa, a participant of the 1996 Olympic Games, four–time Polish Champion (1990, 2006, 2007, 2008). ==Personal life== He has a brother Andrzej, who is a former volleyball player and coach. His nephew Kacper (born 1997) is also a professional volleyball player.Kacper Stelmach kontynuuje rodzinne tradycje. "Siatkówka zawsze krążyła mi w głowie" – wp.pl – 14-04-2017 ==Career as coach== In the 2015/16 season he was a coach of BBTS Bielsko-Biała. In 2016 he became Philippe Blain's coach assistant in PGE Skra Bełchatów.Krzysztof Stelmach wraca do Bełchatowa – skra.pl – 14-04-2017 ==Sporting achievements== * CEV Champions League ** 16px 2007/2008 – with PGE Skra Bełchatów * National championships ** 1989/1990 16px Polish Championship, with AZS Częstochowa ** 1994/1995 16px Italian Championship, with Alpitour Cuneo ** 2005/2006 16px Polish Cup, with BOT Skra Bełchatów ** 2005/2006 16px Polish Championship, with BOT Skra Bełchatów ** 2006/2007 16px Polish Cup, with BOT Skra Bełchatów ** 2006/2007 16px Polish Championship, with BOT Skra Bełchatów ** 2007/2008 16px Polish Championship, with PGE Skra Bełchatów * National team ** 1991 16px Summer Universiade ** 1993 16px Summer Universiade ===Individually=== * 2006: Polish Cup – Most Valuable Player ==External links== * Coach profile at CEV.eu * Player profile at PlusLiga.pl * Player profile at LegaVolley.it * Player profile at WorldofVolley.com * Player profile at Volleybox.net ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from Świebodzice Category:Sportspeople from Lower Silesian Voivodeship Category:Polish men's volleyball players Category:Olympic volleyball players of Poland Category:Volleyball players at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:AZS Częstochowa players Category:Skra Bełchatów players Category:ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle coaches Category:AZS Olsztyn coaches Category:AZS Częstochowa coaches Category:Stal Nysa coaches
title: Krzysztof Stelmach
